home.title: QuatroBus - Technology that drives growth and success
home.description: We're here to help you simplify and streamline all your daily operations. Transform your transport company and stand out from your competition with our integrated software.

features.title: QuatroBus - Integrated software for transportation companies
features.description:
Leave manual processes behind and optimize your operations. 
Manage your terminals, schedules, routes and tickets sold in real time. 
Simplify your business today.

Features.title: What is the <spotlight>QuatroBus Web System?</spotlight>
Features.subtitle: It is a complete and comprehensive digital tool, hosted in the cloud and designed to adapt to the needs of your operations.

Access from any device with internet and Google Chrome. 
It's simple and practical!

2.title: Compatibility

benefits.1: Avoid long lines with Express Sales in high seasons
benefits.2: Facilitates the availability of routes and seats in real time

1.title: Cargo and parcel management
1.subtitle: Simplify registration, control and cargo management

benefits.0: Simplifies the registration and payment of parcels
benefits.1: Streamlines the boarding and disembarkation process
benefits.2: Track orders and their delivery statuses

features.0: Functional for price management by rate, volume, weight and more
features.1: Generate manifests and electronic submission guides
features.2: Cargo identification by QR, series and correlative

2.title: Administrative management
2.subtitle: Optimize the management of your company in real time

benefits.0: Manage all your offices and terminals
benefits.1: Control and manage your internal processes
benefits.2: Offer a loyalty program to your customers

features.0: Functional to modify sketches of buses, routes and prices
features.1: Create users with roles for your team
features.2: Sort and integrate documents by serial and correlative numbers

3.title: Report Management
3.subtitle: Improve your decision making with comprehensive reports

benefits.0: Monitor sales by user, office and trip type
benefits.2: Analyze seat occupancy and revenue per route

features.0: Import documents declared in electronic billing

4.title: Baggage Management
4.subtitle: Streamline baggage screening from start to finish

benefits.0: Simplifies the registration and control of luggage weight
benefits.1: Optimize management and charging for excess baggage
benefits.2: Minimizes the risk of misplaced or lost luggage

features.0: Labeling for identification and boarding and disembarkation process

5.title: Electronic Billing
5.subtitle: Save time by sending proof of payment

benefits.0: List of all receipts issued by the company
benefits.2: Integrates documents from the different modules of the system

features.0: Direct link with your country's tax collection portal
features.2: Reports available from the online electronic billing module

force.title: Expand your sales force, enhance your administrative and commercial management, all QuatroBus
force.text:
Quatrobus is the most complete and efficient management system on the market; 
has more than 20 years of successful experience in the specialized software industry for bus transportation companies in Latin America and North America

0.description: Stable system that is always available for queries and report generation.

1.description: Dynamic and easily accessible platform that allows you to see all the information in real time to achieve the efficient development of various operations.

comments.0: I am happy with the initiatives that QuatroBus has, the support team provides quick responses to problems or incidents and having an account manager has made our processes easier on a day-to-day basis.
comments.1: The main attribute of the system is its speed.
comments.5:
My experience with QuatroBus has been satisfactory. 
Thanks to the Software system we have optimized time and daily operations, achieving optimal progress in our sales and improvements in our administration as a company.
comments.7: Everything is recorded in the ticket system and is very well organized.
comments.8:
I want to express my sincere thanks to QuatroBus for the excellent service they provided me! 
From the moment I contacted their team, I felt completely supported and well cared for.

text.0: Obtain real-time control and a complete overview of your company to streamline daily processes, reduce operating costs and attract more customers effectively.
text.1: We help you grow to stand out in a market as competitive as transportation.
